Articles.Content:
I know this was a real pain in the bum trying to pull this off, so I thought it would be a perfect challenge! The real launch is happening in January of the new year. Hopefully they are a little bit more accurate than most of my attempts

Task: land a Falcon 9 type lower stage, onto a ship like in the video below. Does not have to be perfect, but as long as it stands up and remains stable, you win the challenge!! Good luck!

Share any interesting screenshots or if you even make a video, please share with us! Thanks!!

Yes, you are missing some vital things to make this a proper challenge... Rules and Scoring!

It's your challenge, have a look at other challenges to get an idea of what rules you might need and edit your original post

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103710-SpaceX-sea-landing-challenge%21

I'm sorry.

My mistake, I have posted my video into his thread now, sorry about the re-post!
